title: aaj kuch huaa hai
content:
<html lang="hi">

<head>

  <meta charset="UTF-8"></meta>

  <meta content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0" name="viewport"></meta>

 

  <style>

    body {
      font-family: "Segoe UI", sans-serif;
      background: #f9f9f9;
      color: #333;
      padding: 20px;
    }
    h1 {
      text-align: center;
      color: #1a73e8;
      font-weight: 700;
    }
    p {
      text-align: center;
      color: #178517;
      font-weight: 700;
    }
    #map {
      height: 400px;
      width: 100%;
      border-radius: 15px;
      box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
      margin-bottom: 20px;
    }
    .info {
      text-align: center;
      margin-bottom: 10px;
      font-size: 16px;
    }
    .info strong {
      color: #444;
    }
    .buttons {
      text-align: center;
      margin-top: 15px;
    }
    .buttons a,
    .buttons button {
      display: inline-block;
      margin: 6px 10px;
      padding: 10px 18px;
      background-color: #1a73e8;
      color: white;
      text-decoration: none;
      border: none;
      border-radius: 30px;
      font-weight: 600;
      cursor: pointer;
      transition: background 0.3s ease;
    }
    .buttons a:hover,
    .buttons button:hover {
      background-color: #0c56c3;
    }
    .note {
      font-size: 14px;
      text-align: center;
      margin-top: 10px;
      color: #777;
    }
  </style>
</head>
<body>
<h1>üìç Dropped Pin</h1>
<p>üìçJust Click On The Map ‚Äì Get Location, Copy, And Share!üìç</p>
<div id="map"></div>
<div class="info">
  <p><strong>üó∫Ô∏èLocation:</strong> <span id="latlng">--- Click on Map ---üìç</span></p>
  <a href="#" id="gmapLink" target="_blank">üåè Open in Google Maps</a>
</div>
<div class="buttons">
  <button onclick="copyLink()">üìã üîóCopy link</button>
  <button onclick="getLiveLocation()">üìç Live Location</button>
  <a href="#" id="whatsappShare" target="_blank">üü¢ WhatsApp</a>
  <a href="#" id="emailShare" target="_blank">üìß Email</a>
</div>
<p class="note">‚û°Ô∏è Click And Drop A Pin On The Map | Copy Or Share Location</p>
<!-- Google Maps JS API -->
<script src="https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/js?key=AIzaSyC117lB_sC9UHo9g_zKFfNGtS3NUo3QC-s"></script>
<script>
  let currentLink = "";
  let map;
  let marker;
  function initMap() {
    const defaultLoc = { lat: 26.9124, lng: 75.7873 }; // Jaipur
    map = new google.maps.Map(document.getElementById("map"), {
      zoom: 6,
      center: defaultLoc,
    });
    map.addListener("click", function (e) {
      const lat = e.latLng.lat().toFixed(6);
      const lng = e.latLng.lng().toFixed(6);
      const link = `https://www.google.com/maps?q=${lat},${lng}`;
      currentLink = link;
      document.getElementById("latlng").innerText = `${lat}, ${lng}`;
      document.getElementById("gmapLink").href = link;
      document.getElementById("whatsappShare").href = `https://wa.me/?text=üìç%20Location:%20${encodeURIComponent(link)}`;
      document.getElementById("emailShare").href = `mailto:?subject=Dropped%20Pin&body=üìç%20Location:%20${encodeURIComponent(link)}`;
      if (marker) marker.setMap(null);
      marker = new google.maps.Marker({
        position: { lat: parseFloat(lat), lng: parseFloat(lng) },
        map: map,
      });
    });
  }
  function copyLink() {
    if (!currentLink) {
      alert("Please Click On The Map First.");
      return;
    }
    navigator.clipboard.writeText(currentLink).then(() => {
      alert("üîó Link Copied!");
    });
  }
  function getLiveLocation() {
    if (!navigator.geolocation) {
      alert("Your Browser Does Not Support Geolocation.");
      return;
    }
    // Show loading message
    document.getElementById("latlng").innerText = "üîç The Location Is Being Searched...";
    // High accuracy options for better location precision
    const options = {
      enableHighAccuracy: true,    // Use GPS for high accuracy
      timeout: 15000,              // 15 seconds timeout
      maximumAge: 0                // Don't use cached location
    };
    navigator.geolocation.getCurrentPosition(
      (position) => {
        const lat = position.coords.latitude.toFixed(6);
        const lng = position.coords.longitude.toFixed(6);
        const accuracy = position.coords.accuracy;
        const link = `https://www.google.com/maps?q=${lat},${lng}`;
        currentLink = link;
        // Display location with accuracy info
        document.getElementById("latlng").innerText = `${lat}, ${lng} (¬±${Math.round(accuracy)}m)`;
        document.getElementById("gmapLink").href = link;
        document.getElementById("whatsappShare").href = `https://wa.me/?text=üìç%20Location:%20${encodeURIComponent(link)}`;
        document.getElementById("emailShare").href = `mailto:?subject=Dropped%20Pin&body=üìç%20Location:%20${encodeURIComponent(link)}`;
        // Update map center and zoom to user's location
        map.setCenter({ lat: parseFloat(lat), lng: parseFloat(lng) });
        map.setZoom(18); // Higher zoom for better precision view
        // Remove existing marker and add new one at user's location
        if (marker) marker.setMap(null);
        marker = new google.maps.Marker({
          position: { lat: parseFloat(lat), lng: parseFloat(lng) },
          map: map,
          title: `Your Location (¬±${Math.round(accuracy)}m accuracy)`
        });
        // Add accuracy circle to show precision
        const accuracyCircle = new google.maps.Circle({
          strokeColor: '#1a73e8',
          strokeOpacity: 0.8,
          strokeWeight: 2,
          fillColor: '#1a73e8',
          fillOpacity: 0.15,
          map: map,
          center: { lat: parseFloat(lat), lng: parseFloat(lng) },
          radius: accuracy
        });
      },
      (error) => {
        let errorMessage = "Could Not Get Location. ";
        
        switch(error.code) {
          case error.PERMISSION_DENIED:
            errorMessage += "Please allow location.";
            break;
          case error.POSITION_UNAVAILABLE:
            errorMessage += "Location information is not available.";
            break;
          case error.TIMEOUT:
            errorMessage += "It's taking time to find the location. Please try again.";
            break;
          default:
            errorMessage += "An unknown error has occurred.";
            break;
        }
        
        alert(errorMessage);
        document.getElementById("latlng").innerText = "--- Click on Map ---üìç";
      },
      options
    );
  }
  window.onload = initMap;
</script>
</body>
</html>
<h2>How to Use the Dropped Pin Tool</h2>
<ol>
  <li>Click on "Generate Pin"</li>
  <li>Allow location permission (or enter manually)</li>
  <li>Copy the generated location link</li>
  <li>Share it with anyone, anywhere</li>
</ol>
<div class="separator" style="clear: both;"><a href="https://blogger.googleusercontent.com/img/b/R29vZ2xl/AVvXsEig73xV71f3hNEnRvu4VBhTeGT7cFyRaYsQIxqwvXBlSYnHDeezcOI0hPQGIc5jpzWVYscBPiW5rp1h4rrJSGqkZfIwj4JPBZhh4_BPP7skWJP2cbYOKBBvkKzaYjpRZqB3T1KAbfC-kWk0jWJL0GQzvfWQDmG7lTmBWn-teLsfTiwh2qjderzZcC82mTWg/s1089/How-to-Drop-a-Pin.webp" style="display: block; padding: 1em 0px; text-align: center;"><img alt="" border="0" data-original-height="615" data-original-width="1089" src="https://blogger.googleusercontent.com/img/b/R29vZ2xl/AVvXsEig73xV71f3hNEnRvu4VBhTeGT7cFyRaYsQIxqwvXBlSYnHDeezcOI0hPQGIc5jpzWVYscBPiW5rp1h4rrJSGqkZfIwj4JPBZhh4_BPP7skWJP2cbYOKBBvkKzaYjpRZqB3T1KAbfC-kWk0jWJL0GQzvfWQDmG7lTmBWn-teLsfTiwh2qjderzZcC82mTWg/s320/How-to-Drop-a-Pin.webp" width="320" /></a></div>
<h2>Key Features of DroppedPin.xyz</h2>
<ul>
  <li>‚úÖ No app installation needed</li>
  <li>‚úÖ Accurate GPS location</li>
  <li>‚úÖ One-click sharing</li>
  <li>‚úÖ Mobile & desktop friendly</li>
  <li>‚úÖ 100% free and anonymous</li>
</ul>
<h2>Who Can Use This Dropped Pin Tool?</h2>
<p>
  üßë‚Äçüíº Business deliveries<br />
  üöó Cab & auto drivers<br />
  üì¶ Courier services<br />
  üë®‚Äçüë©‚Äçüëß Friends & family meetups<br />
  üõ†Ô∏è Field workers & technicians
</p>
<h2>üìå Frequently Asked Questions</h2>
<h3>‚ùì Is this tool free to use?</h3>
<p>Yes, it's 100% free for all users, no registration required.</p>
<h3>‚ùì Does this work on mobile?</h3>
<p>Yes, it is fully mobile responsive and GPS-supported.</p>
<h3>‚ùì Can I generate a pin without GPS?</h3>
<p>Yes, you can enter your address manually too.</p>
<script type="application/ld+json">
{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "WebApplication",
  "name": "Dropped Pin",
  "url": "https://droppedpin.xyz",
  "applicationCategory": "Utility",
  "operatingSystem": "All",
  "browserRequirements": "Requires JavaScript. Compatible with modern browsers.",
  "description": "Dropped Pin Finder helps you locate any pinned location on the map with latitude and longitude coordinates. Instantly get map links for easy sharing.",
  "inLanguage": "en",
  "offers": {
    "@type": "Offer",
    "price": "0.00",
    "priceCurrency": "USD"
  },
  "creator": {
    "@type": "Organization",
    "name": "Dropped Pin",
    "url": "https://droppedpin.xyz"
  },
}
</script>
